edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce
Class Annotation

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.Annotation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Annotation
extends Object
implements Serializable

Class to hold standard annotation messages. Designed for future extensions as well as interoperability with C / C++ code.

Author:
Nisarg

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ID

public int ID
Top 8 bits of ID are the last 8 bits of the agent's IP address. The remaining bits are a 24 bit counter

IDtoReplace

public int IDtoReplace
If this annotation is an update rather than entirely new, this is the ID of the old annotation, so it can be deleted. If there is no such annotation, this is 0.

timestamp

public long timestamp
Must be in unix format

type

public int type
Must be one of the constants defined in Annotation (e.g. FREEFORM_ANNOTATION)

shortName

public String shortName
A word or two suitable for display on a map

longDescription

public String longDescription
Full details of the annotation

locationX

public float locationX

locationY

public float locationY

width

public float width

height

public float height

isObstacle

public boolean isObstacle

binaryData

public byte[] binaryData

extension

public transient Object extension
